lead_paragraph: LEWIS--Gladys I.,"Lady Lewis" passed away Thursday, January 21, 2016 in Monroe, NJ. Wife of the late Sir W. Arthur Lewis, she is survived by her daughters, Elizabeth Channon and Barbara Virgil, and their families. Services Saturday, January 30, 2016 at 11:00am at St. David's Episcopal Church, Cranbury, NJ. Visitation Friday, January 29, 2016 from 4-7pm at A.S. Cole & Son Funeral Home, 22 N. Main St., Cranbury, NJ 08512 and Saturday, January 30, 2016 from 10am- 10:45am at St. David's Episcopal Church, Cranbury, NJ. www.saulfuneralhomes.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEWIS, GLADYS I.
